programme.title: Sisu
programme.desc: In 1944, as the Second World War enters its final stretch, retired Finnish commando Aatami Korpi prospects for gold in the countryside. En route to the nearest town to deposit a motherlode of freshly mined gold, Aatami clashes with sadistic German platoon leader Bruno Helldorf. Action thriller, starring Jorma Tommila and Askel Hennie Jalmari Helander - Director Jorma Tommila - Aatami Korpi Aksel Hennie - Bruno Helldorf Jack Doolan - Wolf Onni Tommila - Schütze Mimosa Willamo - Aino.

programme.title: The Desperate Hour
programme.desc: Recently widowed mother Amy Carr finds her small town thrown into chaos as a shooting takes place at her son's school. Miles away on foot in the dense forest, Amy desperately races against time to save her son as authorities place the town on lockdown. Thriller, starring Naomi Watts, Colton Gobbo and Sierra Maltby Phillip Noyce - Director Naomi Watts - Amy Carr Colton Gobbo - Noah Carr Sierra Maltby - Emily.

programme.title: Captain Fantastic
programme.desc: Drama starring Viggo Mortensen and Frank Langella. Parents Ben and Leslie Cash live off the grid with their six children in a cabin in the backwoods of Washington state where their brood are immersed in left-wing activism and survivalism. However, following a family tragedy, the Cash clan are forced to return to society where they find "normal life" to be a confusing and frightening challenge Matt Ross - Director Viggo Mortensen - Ben Cash Frank Langella - Jack George MacKay - Bodevan Samantha Isler - Kielyr Annalise Basso - Vespyr Nicholas Hamilton - Rellian Charlie Shotwell - Nai Trin Miller - Leslie Cash Erin Moriarty - Claire Missi Pyle - Ellen Kathryn Hahn - Harper Steve Zahn - Dave.

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: In the summer of 1939, influential families in Nazi Germany send their daughters to a finishing school in an English seaside town to learn the language and be ambassadors for Hitler. A teacher sees what is coming and tries to raise the alarm, but the authorities believe he is the problem. Thriller, starring Judi Dench, James D'Arcy, Jim Broadbent and Eddie Izzard Andy Goddard - Director Eddie Izzard - Thomas Miller Judi Dench - Miss Rocholl Carla Juri - Ilse Keller James D'Arcy - Captain Drey Celyn Jones - Corporal Willis David Schofield - Colonel Smith Jim Broadbent - Charlie Maria Dragus - Astrid Tijan Marei - Gretel Franziska Brandmeier - Beatrix Luisa-Céline Gaffron - Sigrid Bianca Nawrath - Paula Daria Wolf - Leta Kevin Eldon - Sergeant Simmons Nigel Lindsay - Mr Wheatley.

programme.title: Fletch
programme.desc: Comedy adventure starring Chevy Chase. Wisecracking investigative reporter IM Fletcher is posing as a beach bum to get a story when Alan Stanwyk approaches with an incredible proposition - $50,000 and a guaranteed escape if he is willing to murder him. Determined to find out why, "Fletch" pretends to agree and finds himself caught up in a bizarre and dangerous plot Michael Ritchie - Director Chevy Chase - IM Fletcher, \Fletch Joe Don Baker - Chief Karlin Dana Wheeler-Nicholson - Gail Stanwyk Tim Matheson - Alan Stanwyk M Emmet Walsh - Dr Dolan George Wendt - Fat Sam Kenneth Mars - Stanton Boyd Geena Davis - Larry Bill Henderson - Speaker William Traylor - Mr Underhill George Wyner - Gillet Richard Libertini - Frank Walker.

programme.title: Fletch Lives
programme.desc: Comedy mystery starring Chevy Chase and Julianne Phillips. Reckless reporter and master of disguise IM "Fletch" Fletcher returns, this time travelling to Louisiana to claim his inheritance - an 80-acre plantation called Belle Isle. Fletch is looking forward to a lifetime of tennis, mint juleps and southern belles. This delusion doesn't last long, however, because things at Belle Isle are not what they seem and a killer is just around the corner Michael Ritchie - Director Chevy Chase - Fletch Julianne Phillips - Becky Ann Culpepper Hal Holbrook - \Ham\ Johnson R Lee Ermey - Jimmy Lee Farnsworth Richard Libertini - Frank Walker Randall \Tex\ Cobb - Ben Dover Cleavon Little - Calculus George Wyner - Gillet Patricia Kalember - Amanda Ray Ross.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell returns to the Top Gun Instructor programme where he must confront his past as he trains a group of younger pilots for a deadly mission. Among them is the son of 'Maverick''s deceased best friend, Lieutenant Nick 'Goose' Bradshaw. Action drama, starring Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller, Val Kilmer and Bashir Salahuddin Joseph Kosinski - Director Tom Cruise - Pete \Maverick\ Mitchell Jennifer Connelly - Penny Benjamin Val Kilmer - Tom \Iceman\ Kazansky Miles Teller - Bradley \Rooster\ Bradshaw Glen Powell - Jake \Hangman\ Seresin Jon Hamm - Beau \Cyclone\ Simpson Ed Harris - Rear Admiral Bashir Salahuddin - Bernie \Hondo\ Coleman Monica Barbaro - Natasha \Phoenix\ Trace Lewis Pullman - Robert \Bob\ Floyd Charles Parnell - \Warlock Danny Ramirez - Mickey \Fanboy\ Garcia Jay Ellis - Reuben \Payback\ Fitch Jean Louisa Kelly - Sara Kazansky Manny Jacinto - Fritz.

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
programme.desc: Period action fantasy starring Charlie Hunnam and Jude Law. Streetwise ruffian Arthur has been living on the streets ever since he was a child, when his father, the king of the Britons, was murdered. With the country now in the grip of the ruthless Vortigern, Arthur discovers his true royal destiny and fights against the very monarchy he was born to lead Guy Ritchie - Director Charlie Hunnam - Arthur Jude Law - Vortigern Eric Bana - Uther Pendragon Astrid Bergès-Frisbey - The Mage Djimon Hounsou - Bedivere Aidan Gillen - Bill Freddie Fox - Rubio Craig McGinlay - Percival Tom Wu - George Kingsley Ben-Adir - Wet Stick Neil Maskell - Back Lack Annabelle Wallis - Maggie Mikael Persbrandt - Greybeard Geoff Bell - Mischief John Peter Ferdinando - Earl of Mercia David Beckham - Trigger Katie McGrath - Elsa Poppy Delevingne - Igraine Rob Knighton - Mordred Guy Ritchie - Inn owner Millie Brady - Katia.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part III

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Horror, Thriller, Documentary And Factual, Arts And Culture, Sci Fi ║ 1999 ║ 12
programme.desc: Period horror adventure starring Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz. A party of archaeologists, led by American adventurer Rick O'Connell, discover a tomb containing the 3,000-year-old remains of a murderous Egyptian priest, Imhotep. When the mummy is accidentally disturbed, he unleashes his terrifying powers on those who have desecrated his resting place Stephen Sommers - Director Brendan Fraser - Rick O'Connell Rachel Weisz - Evelyn John Hannah - Jonathan Arnold Vosloo - Imhotep Kevin J O'Connor - Beni Jonathan Hyde - Egyptologist Oded Fehr - Ardeth Bay Omid Djalili - Warden.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Thriller, Horror ║ 2001 ║ PG
programme.desc: Period horror adventure sequel starring Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz. When the young son of Rick O'Connell and his Egyptologist wife find an ancient bracelet that holds power over the armies of the fearsome Scorpion King, it attracts the attention of Meela, reincarnated lover of the resurrected high priest Imhotep, who needs the artefact to help him defeat the Scorpion King and become the ultimate ruler Stephen Sommers - Director Brendan Fraser - Rick O'Connell Rachel Weisz - Evelyn / Nefertiri John Hannah - Jonathan Arnold Vosloo - Imhotep Oded Fehr - Ardeth Bay Patricia Velasquez - Meela / Anck-Su-Namun Dwayne Johnson - The Scorpion King Freddie Boath - Alex Alun Armstrong - Mr Hafez Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje - Lock-Nah Shaun Parkes - Izzy Buttons Aharon Ipale - Pharaoh Donna Air - Showgirl.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.sub-title: Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action, Horror, Mystery ║ 2008 ║ 15
programme.desc: Science-fiction action thriller produced by JJ Abrams, creator of TV series Lost. As a group of New York friends throws a leaving party for one of their number, the event is recorded on a video camera. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: According to legend, Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase and for hundreds of years the nobleman's ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. Daughter Virginia makes her displeasure about the move clear and she forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to America. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: According to legend, Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase and for hundreds of years the nobleman's ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. American patriarch Hiram B Otis moves from Boston into the country pile with his clan. Daughter Virginia makes her displeasure about the move clear and she forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to America. programme.title: Mavka: The Forest Song
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Children's, Animation, Comedy, Family ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Kind-hearted village artist Lucas travels deep into the enchanted forest to locate a tree that bears a special insignia. In this realm of magic and wonder, Lucas locks eyes with inquisitive nymph Mavka, who yearns to rebuild bridges between the human and spirit worlds. programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: A clever young gymnast seeks reassurance from Paul following a car accident. But Paul has a sneaky suspicion she has something to hide. (S1, ep 3).

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: As the trial winds to a close, Mason and team attempt to tie up loose ends - and set the stage for their futures. Season finale. (S1, ep 8).

programme.title: Un Amore
programme.desc: New & Exclusive. In 1996, Alessandro and Anna meet on an interrailing trip through Spain. Although life forces them apart, they are drawn back together 20 years later. (S1, ep 1 of 6).

programme.title: Un Amore
programme.desc: New & Exclusive. After their meeting, the love between Ale and Anna is rekindled. While she questions her marriage, he must choose whether to stay in Bologna. (S1, ep 2 of 6).

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: The locals decide to raise 150,000 pounds for a memorial commemorating fishermen lost at sea. Plus, Pat considers taking part in a skydive, and the search for scallops begins. (7/10).

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: The tides are turning as Brixham's oldest traditions begin to fade. Pat ponders selling up and visits a clairvoyant, while celebrity chef Mitch Tonks puts on the Crab Festival. (8/10).

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Summer has arrived, bringing with it the hustle and bustle of tourism. While Pat prepares for a full house, it's up to powerboat instructor Mike to enforce the laws of the sea. (9/10).

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: This insightful documentary series returns to shore and comes to an end. The fishermen spend some quality time with their loved ones, and Logan has a big decision to make. (10/10).

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: As Ford unveils his vision for a bold new narrative, Delores comes to terms with who she is, while Maeve sets her plan in motion. (S1, ep 10).

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky goes on the warpath when one of his cronies is attacked, while Jimmy and Al set up a meeting with their rivals. Strong language/violence/sex. (S1, ep 6).

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
